document.docAuthor: Marshall, Stephen A., Roháček, Jindřich, Dong, Hui & Buck, Matthias
document.masterDocTitle: The state of Sphaeroceridae (Diptera: Acalyptratae): a world catalog update covering the years 2000 - 2010, with new generic synonymy, new combinations, and new distributions

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The state of Sphaeroceridae (Diptera: Acalyptratae): a world catalog update covering the years 2000 - 2010, with new generic synonymy, new combinations, and new distributions

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Minilimosina ( Svarciella )
. –
ROHÁČEK (2010a) : 112
–113 [key to West Palaearctic species, illustr.].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Minilimosina ( S. ) bartaki
Roháček, 2010
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Czech Republic , Romania .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Minilimosina ( Svarciella ) bartaki Roháček, 2010a: 98
[both sexes, phylogenetic notes, illustr.]. Type locality: Czech Republic , Podyjí NP, 1.5 km SW of Havraníky, steppe, 48º48′29″N , 15º59′31″E ,
340 m .
HT male (SMOC).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Minilimosina ( S. ) egena
Roháček, 1992
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Greece ( Crete ), Switzerland .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Minilimosina ( Svarciella ) egena
. –
ROHÁČEK (2010a) : 110
[description of female, illustr., new record from Greece ( Crete )].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Minilimosina ( S. ) floreni
Roháček & Marshall, 1985
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Czech Republic , Slovakia , Sweden .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Minilimosina ( Svarciella ) floreni
. –
ROHÁČEK (2009a) : 110
[new record from Slovakia , habitats].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Minilimosina ( S. ) guestphalica
(Duda, 1918)
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Belgium , Czech Republic , Denmark , Estonia , Finland , France , Germany , Great Britain , Hungary , Ireland , Latvia , Norway , Poland , Romania , Russia (NET), Slovakia , Sweden , Switzerland .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Minilimosina ( Svarciella ) guestphalica
. –
WITHERS (2007) : 147
[new record from France ].

Minilimosina v-atrum
. –
KARPA (2008) : 28
[misidentification, record from Latvia ].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Minilimosina ( S. ) pujadei
Carles-Tolrá, 2001
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Andorra , Czech Republic .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Minilimosina ( Svarciella ) pujadei
Carles-Tolrá, 2001c: 11
[male, illustr.]. Type locality: Andorra , Santa Coloma ;
ROHÁČEK et al. (2005) : 340
[new record from Czech Republic , habitat];
ROHÁČEK (2010a) : 104
[male, redescription, illustr.].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Minilimosina ( S. ) v-atrum
(Villeneuve, 1917)
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Belgium , Czech Republic , France , Germany , Great Britain , Hungary , Italy , Poland , Russia (CET, FE), Slovakia , Sweden , Switzerland .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Minilimosina ( Svarciella ) v-atrum
. –
GATT (2006c) : 68
[new record from Italy ].

Minilimosina splendens
. –
BRUYN et al. (1997) : 235
[new record from Belgium ];
WITHERS (2007) : 147
[new record from France ].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Minilimosina ( S. ) vitripennis
(Zetterstedt, 1847)
. Distr.: Nearctic: Canada (AB, BC, MB, NB, NF, NS, NT, ON, QC, YT), USA (AK, AZ, CA, CO, ID, NC, NH, OR, PA, UT, WA); Palaearctic: Afghanistan , Andorra , Austria , Belgium , Bulgaria , Canary Is. ( Spain ), Cyprus , Czech Republic , Denmark , Estonia , Faeroe Is. ( Denmark ), Finland , France ,

Germany , Great Britain , Greece (incl. Crete ), Hungary , Iceland , Ireland , Italy , Latvia , Macedonia, Madeira ( Portugal ), Mongolia , Netherlands , North Korea , Norway , Poland , Portugal , Romania , Russia (FE, SET, WS), Slovakia , Spain , Sweden , Switzerland .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Minilimosina vitripennis
. –
BLACKITH et al. (1991) : 226
[new record from Ireland ].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Minilimosina ( Svarciella ) vitripennis
. – ROHÁČEK et al. (2003): 56 [new record from Canary Is.]; ROHÁČEK (2007a) : 108 [new record from Madeira ( Portugal )]; ROHÁČEK (2010a) : 109 [new records from mainland Greece , Crete , Portugal ].

Minilimosina ( S. ) vixa
Marshall, 1985
. Distr.: Nearctic: Canada (NB, NS, ON), USA (ME, NH); Palaearctic: Spain .

Minilimosina vixa
. – CARLES- TOLRÁ & SALOÑA (2004): 47 [new record from Spain ].
